writings.text: 朝焼けは雨、夕焼けは晴れ
朝焼けは雨夕焼けは晴れ

readings.text: あさやけはあめ、ゆうやけははれ

furigana.writing: 朝焼けは雨、夕焼けは晴れ
furigana.reading: あさやけはあめ、ゆうやけははれ

glossary: red sky at night, sailors delight; red sky in morning, sailors take warning
red sky at night, shepherds delight; red sky in morning, shepherds take warning
